sentences.en: He could hoodwink him all right.
He is an easy person to hoodwink.
People expect others to be honest, which is why conmen find it so easy to hoodwink people.
sentences.cn: 人们认为别人是诚实正直的，所以骗子很容易行骗得逞。

sentences.en: That past wound, will momentarily remind, be not suffered again by love, do not hoodwink.
sentences.cn: 那过去的伤, 随时会提醒, 别再被爱情所折磨, 不要被蒙蔽.

trans.tran_cn: 遮眼, 欺骗, 蒙蔽
trans.tran_en: to trick someone in a clever way so that you can get an advantage for yourself
